data.title: Sohrai Painting - Harvest Festival
data.description: Traditional Sohrai wall painting on canvas depicting the harvest festival celebration. Hand-painted by master artist using natural pigments.
data.craftStory: This artwork follows the centuries-old Sohrai tradition, originally painted on mud walls during harvest festivals. Each symbol represents aspects of nature worship and agricultural prosperity.

data.title: Dokra Elephant Figurine
data.description: Handcrafted brass elephant using the ancient lost-wax Dokra technique. A symbol of wisdom and good fortune.
data.craftStory: Dokra is a 4000-year-old metalworking tradition. Each piece is unique as the clay mold is broken to reveal the brass artwork inside.

data.title: Tussar Silk Saree - Natural Dyed
data.description: Luxurious Tussar silk saree with traditional tribal motifs. Naturally dyed using plant-based colors.
data.craftStory: Jharkhand's Tussar silk is known as 'Kosa' and is produced by silkworms feeding on native trees. The golden luster is natural and unique to this region.

data.title: Bamboo Craft Storage Basket
data.description: Intricately woven bamboo basket with tribal patterns. Functional art piece for storage or decoration.
data.craftStory: Bamboo weaving is a traditional skill passed down through generations of Munda families. Each basket takes 2-3 days to complete.

data.title: Khovar Art Wall Hanging
data.description: Traditional Khovar wedding art rendered on handmade paper. Features sacred marriage symbols.
data.craftStory: Khovar art is traditionally created on the walls of wedding chambers. The geometric patterns symbolize fertility and marital bliss.

data.title: Stone Carved Tribal Deity
data.description: Hand-carved stone sculpture of a Sarna deity. Traditional tribal religious art.
data.craftStory: Sarna worship is central to tribal spirituality. This sculpture represents the deity of the sacred grove, carved from local granite.

data.title: Tribal Terracotta Pot Set
data.description: Set of 3 hand-molded terracotta pots with traditional tribal designs. Perfect for plants or decoration.
data.craftStory: The Kumhar community has been making pottery for generations. Each pot is fired in traditional kilns and decorated with natural colors.

data.title: Handwoven Tribal Shawl
data.description: Warm woolen shawl with traditional tribal motifs. Handwoven on traditional looms.
data.craftStory: This shawl is woven using techniques passed down through generations. The geometric patterns tell stories of tribal mythology.

data.title: Lac Bangle Set
data.description: Set of 6 colorful lac bangles with traditional tribal designs. Handcrafted using ancient techniques.
data.craftStory: Lac bangles are a traditional adornment in tribal marriages. The intricate patterns are created using heated lac and skilled hands.

data.title: Tribal Musical Drum - Mandar
data.description: Traditional Mandar drum used in Santhali folk music. Handcrafted with authentic materials.
data.craftStory: The Mandar is central to Santhali celebrations and rituals. This drum is made using traditional methods and local materials.
